newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Sausage pegs back year forecasts.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Sausage pegs back year forecasts.

text.p: Internet software developer Sausage Software Ltd said on Thursday it has revised down its earnings forecasts for the year to June 30, 1997.

Sausage said the net loss was now estimated at A$5.0 million for the 1996/97 year, an increase on the previous forecast of A$2.0 million loss, with revenues now seen at A$4.0 million, compared with A$7.6 million previously.
It said the new forecast for the operating loss was A$2.8 million, compared with the previous estimate of A$100,000.
Sausage earlier reported a net loss of A$1.93 million for the six months ended December 31, 1996.
